name: netshoes-front-end
author: Andre Kaoru Fuziyama <andrefuziyama@gmail.com>

scripts.start: npm run clean && gulp --colors && gulp watch --colors && cp 'html/Netshoes-Home.html' index.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && gulp --colors --production && cp 'html/Netshoes-Home.html' index.html
scripts.dev: npm run build && gulp watch --colors --production && cp 'html/Netshoes-Home.html' index.html

description: * See a list of products; * Be able to add or remove items to the cart and get instant visual feedback; * See the products added to the cart.
